borders-entertainment-contest
None
Buccleuch Centre, Langholm, Dumfries & Galloway, Scotland, UK First Prize: The Scottish Borders Trophy & £150 - St Ronan's Silver Entertainment Prize: The Queen's Head Inn Shield & £150 - Broxburn & Livingston Best Second Section Band: The Souter Ronnie Trophy & £100 - St Ronan's Silver Best Third Section Band: The John A. Wilson Memorial Trophy & £100 - Renfrew Burgh Best Fourth Section Band: The Harry Pearce Memorial Trophy & £100 - Buckhaven & Methil Miners Highest Placed Borders Band: The St. Ronan's Bicentenary Trophy - St Ronan's Silver Best Deportment: The Langholm Town Band Bicentenary Shield - Langholm Town Best Soloist: The Walter Nichol Memorial Trophy & Medal - Soprano, Durham Miners Best Instrumentalist: The Jedforest Band 150th Anniversary Trophy & Medal - Euphonium, Broxburn & Livingston Best Solo Cornet: The Dave Young Trophy & Medal - Shotts St Patrick's Brass Best Bass Section: The Bert Neil Memorial Quaich - Barrhead Burgh Best Percussion Section: The Jenny Corbett Memorial Cup - Jedforest Instrumental
